name: Puppet Zoo Pilomy
overview: Puppet Zoo Pilomy is a simulation game that plays like Toy Blocks. Build up different kinds of animals with the parts by using the simple controls, and explore the nature with your animals today. Your character must help Dr. Polygon with his new invention that allows to create new animals that he calls puppets, but they are living things that needs hearts that you must collect. The player needs first to go ask Dr Polygon for animal pieces and after got the pieces he will have to go to the laboratory where he must combine the pieces to create different kind of animals (real or not real animals) and after that he got to spend 50 hearts points to operate the machine and create a new puppet. After create the puppet, he can sell the puppet to a shop where it will be sell to the childrens, donated to the zoo (he will receive points for that) or free the animal in one of the 4 different places that are on the land. If he choose to free it the player can travel there and the animal in the habitat. The town also features other places to go, like a cinema, a church, shops, etc.
